title: Cant Open Hextech Crafting
body: Whenever I try to open hextech crafting my client crashes. Any help?

replies.body: Repairing the client doesn't work. I've tried several times and even did a fresh install. I haven't been able to use Hextech crafting all week. It's a huge bummer :(((

We're aware of some issues around crashes when interacting with Hextech Crafting and are looking into a fix. Some players are able to resolve this by running windows updates, but you may need to [disable the game bar or game DVR](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) after you update if you're running Windows 10.

Let me know if you have any questions.
